name: Verify Secret Discovery
description: Validates that secret objects can be discovered using the camera system and provide appropriate feedback.
testObjective: Ensure secret discovery mechanic works correctly and adds secret files to the filesystem.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Open camera view in the cockpit
steps.expected: Camera interface opens with counter showing scannable objects

steps.action: Search camera view for small white object (secret)
steps.expected: Small white object is visible in camera view

steps.action: Hold E to interact with the secret object
steps.expected: System displays message: 'You discovered a secret'
New file LAD.r is added to the filesystem
Raspberry stamp image is displayed with close button

postconditions: Secret file is accessible in filesystem
